p: The AQUA-DUCT 1.0 software [ 30] was used to track water and cosolvent molecules. Molecules of interest, which entered the so-called Object, defined as a 5 Å sphere around the centre of geometry of active site residues, namely, H41, C145, H164, and D187, were traced within the Scope region, defined as the interior of a convex hull of both COVID-19 Mpro and SARS Mpro Cα atoms. All visualisations were made in PyMol [ 58].
